verses.verse: Therefore you shall <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4931>charge,<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H3605>always.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H3045>know<s%> you this <S%H3117>day:<s%> for I speak not with your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> his <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> his <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and his <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out <S%H2220>arm,<s%>

And his <S%H226>miracles,<s%> and his <S%H4639>acts,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land;<s%>

And <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and to their <S%H7393>chariots;<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> he made the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H6687>overflow<s%> them as they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, and how the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6>destroyed<s%> them to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%>
And <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to you in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%>

And <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6475>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> them up, and their <S%H1004>households,<s%> and their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3351>substance<s%> that was in their <S%H7272>possession,<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>
But your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>acts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did.<s%>

Therefore shall you <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you may be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it;

And that you may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to them and to their <S%H2233>seed,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

For the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is not as the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from from <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H3318>came<s%> out, <S%H834>where<s%> you <S%H2232>sowed<s%> your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H8248>watered<s%> it with your <S%H7272>foot,<s%> as a <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs:<s%>

But the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you go to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2022>hills<s%> and <S%H1237>valleys,<s%> and <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven:<s%>

A <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1875>cares<s%> for: the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H8548>always<s%> on it, from the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> even to the <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H518>if<s%> you shall <S%H8085>listen<s%> diligently to my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%>

That I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> in his due <S%H6256>season,<s%> the <S%H3138>first<s%> <S%H4456>rain<s%> and the <S%H4456>latter<s%> <S%H3138>rain,<s%> that you may <S%H622>gather<s%> in your <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and your <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and your <S%H3323>oil.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> in your <S%H7704>fields<s%> for your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> that you may <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>full.<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourselves, that your <S%H3824>heart<s%> be not <S%H6601>deceived,<s%> and you <S%H5493>turn<s%> aside, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them;

And then the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and he <S%H6113>shut<s%> up the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that there be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and that the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> not her <S%H2981>fruit;<s%> and lest you <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.

Therefore shall you <S%H7760>lay<s%> up <S%H429>these<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and in your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that they may be as <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> them your <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> of them when you <S%H3427>sit<s%> in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and when you <S%H3212>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when you <S%H7901>lie<s%> down, and when you <S%H6965>rise<s%> up.
And you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> them on the <S%H4201>door<s%> <S%H4201>posts<s%> of your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and on your <S%H8179>gates:<s%>

That your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1121>children,<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them, as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H518>if<s%> you shall diligently <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H1692>join<s%> to him;

Then will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than yourselves.

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H834>on<s%> the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> shall be yours: from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> from the <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> even to the <S%H314>uttermost<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall your <S%H1366>coast<s%> be.

There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H3320>able<s%> to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of you and the <S%H4172>dread<s%> of you on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> that you shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> on, as he has <S%H1696>said<s%> to you.
<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse;<s%>

A <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> <S%H834>if<s%> you <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day:<s%>

And a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> but <S%H5493>turn<s%> aside out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have not <S%H3045>known.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H935>brought<s%> you in to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, that you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> on <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim,<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse<s%> on <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal.<s%>

Are they not on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> where the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H3996>goes<s%> <S%H3996>down,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert<s%> <S%H4136>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H436>plains<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh?<s%>

For you shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

And you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
